config.script:
import time
	
	def refreshBinding(key, sessionId, pageId):
		import time
		system.perspective.print(key, sessionId, pageId)
		while key=="True":
			system.perspective.print("script is running.", sessionId, pageId)
			
			#refresh
			self.getChild("root").getChild("Label_0").refreshBinding("props.text")
			
			time.sleep(5)
			
			#currentValue = self.custom.key
			tagPaths= ['[default]Water Monitoring System/International/Test Pump Station/TestKey']
			currentValue = system.tag.readBlocking(tagPaths)[0].value
			
			key=currentValue
			
			system.perspective.print(currentValue , sessionId, pageId)
			
	sessionId = self.session.props.id
	pageId = self.page.props.pageId
	
	self.custom.key = "True"
	system.util.invokeAsynchronous(refreshBinding , [self.custom.key, sessionId, pageId])
	system.perspective.print("async function has been called.")
